info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:32PM EDT until August 29 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR WAYNE...EASTERN OAKLAND AND MACOMB COUNTIES... At 631 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Richmond to 7 miles southeast of St. Clair Shores to near Trenton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Richmond and Memphis around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Melvindale, Gibraltar, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Utica, Harper Woods, Pleasant Ridge, Grosse Pointe Shores, Huntington Woods and Leonard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
